channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cillian Murphy's Lookalike Son Aran, 17, Follows in Dad's Footsteps as He's Cast in Upcoming HBO Series
item.description: Cillian Murphy's son Aran has signed on for a new role. The 17-year-old will next star in HBO and Sky's co-production of WAR. The teenager will also appear in Taika Waititi's upcoming film Klara and the Sun. Cillian Murphy's son is making a name for himself in the industry. The Oppenheimer star's 17-year-old son Aran has joined the cast of WAR, an upcoming HBO and Sky co-production that will also feature actors Dominic West and Sienna Miller. Aran's talent agency shared the news on Instagram, posting a photo of the teenager who bears a striking resemblance to his dad.
